comments:
Build: 20020423

I was doing some testing for a bug with the expressions view. I had the 
expressions view as a fast view in the Java perspective and as a regular view 
in the Debug perspective. It was the active view in the Debug perspective, and 
the Debug perspective was active. When I loaded Eclipse with this 
configuration, and closed Eclipse without doing anything else, there was an 
error. I tried a few more times, and the error occurred each time.
